translations: n.背包客；徙步旅行者（hiker 的复数）

phrs.translation: 背包客, 徒步旅行者, 远足
改为步行的游客请在此下车, 步行游客请在此下车

sentences.sentence: When he saw some hikers still searching, he decided to lend a hand.
sentences.translation: 当他看到一些徒步者仍在搜寻时，他决定搭把手。

sentences.sentence: Several hikers immediately started looking for her, but their view was screened by trees.
sentences.translation: 几个徒步者立马开始寻找她，但树木挡住了他们的视线。

sentences.sentence: Its views attract many hikers. Henry Grant, a college student at Ithaca College, was one of them.
sentences.translation: 其风光吸引了众多徒步者。伊萨卡学院的学生亨利·格兰特就是其中之一。
